text: Hi Drew is a huge pleasure for me. I’m in my last year of visual effects at West London University and I want to focus on compositing. My background, I have done graphic design in high school in Italy , where I born even if originally I’m ghanian from my parents.
I actually ,yesterday after work , get a look of your show reel and your bio etc and I’m very inspired.

I would like to ask you few question when you have time. Please let me know when and what’s time is the best for you. 

Really nice to
Have you as mentor 

Have a nice day 
Franklin

Hey Franklin, 

A true pleasure to meet you. 
I'd love to help wherever I can. 

I'm actually down in London tomorrow for a business trip, not sure if I'd have time for a meet up, but assuming the job goes ahead, I'll be there more regularly. 

Hit me with any questions- I am certain either I can answer them or know the right person to out them to. 

Any time is good. I'll reply as and when I can 

(Some of my favourite artists have been Italian!)
